thread.title: SEC Charges Municipal Underwriters With Making False Statements
thread.title_full: SEC Charges Municipal Underwriters With Making False Statements - WSJ

author: Ezequiel Minaya
title: SEC Charges Municipal Underwriters With Making False Statements
text:
The Securities and Exchange Commission said it has penalized 22 municipal underwriting firms, including units of BB&T Corp., PNC Financial Services Group Inc. and UBS Group AG, for selling municipal bonds using offering documents that contained false statements or omissions.
The 22 firms settled the cases, tied to events between 2010 and 2014, without admitting or denying guilt for a combined total of more than $4 million and... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
